body.name: CHILLAX HCX280 Smart WiFi Home Camera FHD 1080p Indoor Security Baby Pet Home Surveillance Sound & Motion Detection 2-Way Audio Night Vision SD-Card Slot Work with ChillaxCare App
features: Crystal Clear Images – Full HD 1080p Camera, say goodbye to blurry footage. Infrared night vision provides up to 30 feet of visibility even in the dark.
Multi-level Bank Grade Security – AES 256 encryption plus end-to-end proprietary 2-keys mathematical encryption protects you from unauthorized access to your data and footage.

Communicate & Stay Connected – Talk to anyone via the camera’s built-in microphone & speaker via its 2-way communication feature. Always live video feed on compatible smartphones or devices by ChillaxCare Mobile App.
24/7 Keep Your Space Monitor – With this camera, you can monitor your home, office, or any indoor space and take care of your baby, pets, elderly, or anyone you love.

Invest in Your Peace of Mind – We offer various value-added features on ChillaxCare mobile App, like sound & motion detection alerts, motion-triggered video recording, smartzone setup & alert, select what and whom to share, and elderly protection barge-in services.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Home Is Where Your Peace of Mind Is. You can't fully enjoy your vacation if you keep wondering if your front door is locked. And you can't focus on your business trip if you keep worrying that someone's going break into your house. When you protect your home, you protect your peace of mind. Invest in your home's security. It doesn't have to be an expensive and expansive investment, though. If you're looking for a way to quickly elevate the safety features of your home, you've come to the right place. The Smart Camera for Home & Office by Chillax lets you keep a close eye on your home, wherever you go.

Home Is Where Your Peace of Mind Is. You can't fully enjoy your vacation if you keep wondering if your front door is locked. And you can't focus on your business trip if you keep worrying that someone's going break into your house. When you protect your home, you protect your peace of mind. Invest in your home's security. It doesn't have to be an expensive and expansive investment, though. If you're looking for a way to quickly elevate the safety features of your home, you've come to the right place. The Smart Camera for Home & Office by Chillax lets you keep a close eye on your home, wherever you go.

Don’t Leave Your Safety To Chance Have you ever woken up at night wondering what the weird noise in the living room could be? With this smart indoor camera, you can stop wondering and start taking a more proactive approach to possible security issues inside your home. Equipped with a sound and motion detector, it instantly notifies you of suspicious activities within a 16-foot radius. It has a night vision feature which lets you check in on unlit areas of your home.

Made By Experts, Tested By Homeowners Enjoy bank grade security within the comforts of your home or office. You can easily view the feed through your own smartphone. It also works with other compatible smart gadgets like tablets and laptops. Unlike low quality home cameras that have grainy resolutions, ours has a very sharp high-definition resolution of 1080 pixels. You can also view up to 4 cameras simultaneously so you can install several cameras in different high-risk areas.

Keep An Eye Even With Your Eyes Closed Get a good night's sleep knowing you’re protected. This camera records clearly during the day and at night. In fact, you can still see within a 30 feet radius even without any light. The recording is then saved in the cloud for up to 24 hours. If you want to keep a permanent copy, just save to a compatible microSD card–the camera supports up to 32GB cards (not included). You can also download and share your clips via your smart device.

More Reasons to Love this Smart Home Camera! Multifunctional System Imagine working overtime in your office and being able to watch and talk to your kids at home. You don't have to imagine, with this camera, you can make that possible. It is packed with essential security features including two-way communication that lets you talk with your family and pets. You can also maximize visibility by manually adjusting the camera using its 180° tilt and 360° pan feature. Ready In Seconds Enjoy the professional features of this home camera without the need to hire a professional to assemble it. It is ready for use straight out of the box, no complex assembly needed. You can mount the camera like a regular CCTV on the ceiling or wall or simply set it up on a shelf or solid surface. With its minimalist design and monochromatic color scheme, it is inconspicuous and won't attract unwanted attention. Elevate Your Home and Lifestyle We want to help you create a life filled with comfort, happiness and exciting opportunities for you and your loved ones. This is our guiding philosophy as a brand. Through our premium range of products, we want to build a bridge between the present and the possible. Each product is designed to give you modern, cost-effective, and intuitive solutions while seamlessly integrating into your home and lifestyle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great home security system for cheap
reviews.reviewText: This is a quality system that works well with our chillax baby monitor so that we can now see baby anywhere in our home. The subscription for premium is $5 a month compared to similar apps. We enjoy chillax products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s easy to use and the quality is good and clear but it lags
reviews.reviewText: It may be my slow WiFi but it lags some and takes awhile to load. The 2-way speaker is not great.. besides that i am happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Had to return but worked ok
reviews.reviewText: The lights on the front were way too bright in the dark to use for my son’s room so will be returning but worked well and I like the app! I have the giraffe camera for my daughter which works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent Price, Decent Product
reviews.reviewText: I received two cameras with my purchase, which was perfect as I was able to install them in my daughters’ rooms. For us, it was less about the camera and more about being able to talk to my girls since they are on the second floor and I’m on the first of our home with a newborn (and I’m sometimes too lazy to go upstairs and ask them a question). Like some of the other reviews mentioned, the night vision is pretty decent. The camera is clear enough and you’re able to view more than one screen/room at a time. There is a little bit of a lag and the speaker does cut off when trying to speak in it- but for the price, it’s a decent product! I do not have the premium package and the basic has worked just fine for me so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Video quality is clear
reviews.reviewText: This camera is really easy to use, affordable, and very easy to install and operate. The pixels are very clear, no matter where I am, I can know what the child is doing. Can supervise children reading, eating, sleeping. Really better than anything. I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed In Chillax Ecosystem
reviews.reviewText: These cameras only work via the app and WiFi. They can’t be paired with a parent unit and Chillaxbaby doesn’t offer any other individual cameras that can be paired with a parent unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peace of mind.
reviews.reviewText: I got this because my 12 year old daughter has epilepsy, and was having seizures about 4 times a week. They would leave her extremely exhausted, and un able to stay awake at school. So I would have to keep her home, this is a great way to keep an eye on her with out sitting on top of her all the time.( witch drove her nuts) . It is a good product for the price, the others were a bit pricey.
